actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Commerce.

official_title: A bill to amend the Natural Gas Act in order to give the Federal Power Commission emergency authority to allocate supplies of natural gas.

summary.text: Emergency Natural Gas Allocation Act - Grants, under the Natural Gas Act, the Federal Power Commission emergency authority to allocate supplies of natural gas in cases where the Commission finds that the reduction of natural gas supplies in any area for residential heating or industrial purposes will seriously endanger public health, safety or welfare.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Natural Gas Act in order to give the Federal Power Commission emergency authority to allocate supplies of natural gas.
